# Main network model diagnostics - balanced statistics without regional mixing
This file shows diagnostics for main network models fit using balanced racial/ethnic mixing matrices and degree terms adjusted to correspond to the balanced mixing matrices. 

## Load packages and model fits
```{r, warning=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
suppressMessages(library("EpiModelHIV"))
library("latticeExtra")

load(file = "/homes/dpwhite/R/GitHub Repos/WHAMP/WHAMP scenarios/est/fit.m.balanced.noregiomix.whamp.rda")

```

## MCMC diagnostics

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
mcmc.diagnostics(fit.m$fit)
```

## Suffificient statistics

```{r}
fit.m
```

## Summary of model fit

```{r}
summary(fit.m)
```

## Network diagnostics

```{r}
(dx_main <- netdx(fit.m, nsims = 10, nsteps = 1000, ncores = 4))
plot(dx_main, type="formation")
plot(dx_main, type="duration")
plot(dx_main, type="dissolution")
```
